void assign( int val, const error_category&amp; cat ) noexcept;
}}

Assigns contents to an error condition. Sets the error value to {{c|val}} and error category to {{c|cat}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|val|error value}}
{{par|cat|error category}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
(none)
